alert.note: Alert for Inyo (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 15 at 11:59PM PDT until June 16 at 1:30AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 AM PDT FRIDAY FOR SOUTH CENTRAL INYO COUNTY... At 1159 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms produced very heavy rain in the Panamint Valley along and south of Highway 190. Radar estimated 1.50-2.50 inches of rain had fallen. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Panamint Valley Road, Highway 190 and Trona Wildrose Road. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
